summary: This is an FBI Guardian Complaint Form documenting a tip received on December 17, 2020, regarding a possible accountant for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell named Drew Bernstein. The caller provided information about Bernstein's alleged connection to Epstein and Maxwell, and the document includes the results of database queries conducted by the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the child sex trafficking investigation; the tipster alleges Drew Bernstein was his accountant.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Alleged associate of Jeffrey Epstein; the tipster claims to have met her in Canada with Epstein and seen her at Drew Bernstein's house.

persons.name: Drew Bernstein
persons.context: Individual identified by a tipster as a possible accountant for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The tipster claims to have been around him, heard Epstein mentioned as a good friend, and saw Maxwell at his house.

connections.description: Tipster alleges Bernstein was an accountant for Jeffrey Epstein, mentioning Epstein as a good friend.
Tipster alleges Bernstein was an accountant for Ghislaine Maxwell and claims to have seen Maxwell at Bernstein's house.
Both are mentioned together as individuals for whom Drew Bernstein allegedly worked as an accountant.

events.title: Tip to FBI NTOC
events.description: An individual called the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report information on a possible accountant of Jeffrey Epstein in Los Angeles, California.

keyFacts: A tip was provided to the FBI alleging Drew Bernstein was an accountant for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The tipster claimed to have been around Drew Bernstein, heard Epstein referred to as a good friend, and met Maxwell once in Canada with them.
The tipster also reported seeing Ghislaine Maxwell at Drew Bernstein's house.
The FBI conducted database queries on Drew Bernstein and the firm 'Bernstein and Pinchuk' following the tip.
The document is a formal record of a lead in the ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's network.
